QuestData.Title: Phosphora Hunting
QuestData.Description: Oskar's last wish, before he floated up into that great-eel's gullet, was to bring back food for the captain, so that's what we'll do.$b$bMy brother had a genius plan. He saw those murlocs luring fish out of the reeds with a phosphorescent antenna, and devised a way to make one of his own. All ya need is something that glows.$b$bKill the crabs and groupers that roam the canyon's floor. They aren't edible themselves, but their phosphora is far more valuable than their meat.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 6 Underlight Phosphora from Pyreshell Scuttlers and Luxscale Groupers in Underlight Canyon.
QuestData.CompletionText: We need enough phosphora to make a really bright light, especially if you're going to be competing with those murlocs.
QuestData.RewardText: <Humphrey grabs the phosphora from you and attaches it to an unusual device.>$b$bThere ya go. It's beautiful! Oskar would be proud.
